svg.title: Speech circuit according to Ferdinand de Saussure

cc:Work.dc:title: The speech circuit acc. to de Saussure
cc:Work.dc:description: The model of the speech circuit proposed by Ferdinand de Saussure in "Course in General Linguistics" (1966 [1916]). A conversation is an exchange of vocalized mental signs. The drawing uses the oak clipart by rg1024 http://www.openclipart.org/detail/colored-oak-tree-by-rg1024
